select prod.prod_no, prod.sell_no, prod.prod_cate, prod.event_cate, pimg.prod_img_savename, prod.prod_brand, prod.prod_name, prod.prod_price, prod.prod_date from product prod, prodimg pimg where prod.prod_no = pimg.prod_no and pimg.prod_img_type = 'main' and prod.sell_state = 1
and prod.prod_name like '%' || #{search} || '%'
order by prod_date asc

select prod.prod_no, pimg.prod_img_savename, prod.prod_brand, prod.prod_name, prod.prod_price, prod.prod_detail_img_savename, prod.event_cate, prod.prod_desc, prod.prod_from, prod.prod_wash, prod.prod_qual, prod.prod_date from product prod, prodimg pimg where prod.prod_no = pimg.prod_no and prod.prod_no = #{prod_no} and pimg.prod_img_type = 'main'

select re.review_no, re.review_title, us.nickname, to_char(re.review_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') review_date, re.review_hit, re.review_content, img.review_img_savename from review re, users us, (select rimg.review_img_savename, rimg.review_no from review re, reviewimg rimg where re.review_no = rimg.review_no(+)) img where re.user_no = us.user_no and re.review_no = img.review_no(+) and re.prod_no = #{prod_no} order by review_date desc

select us.nickname, q.qna_no, q.prod_no, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, to_char(q.qna_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') qna_date, q.qna_type, q.user_no, q.buy_no, qimg.qna_img_savename from qna q, users us, (select qimg.qna_img_savename, qimg.qna_no from qna q, qnaimg qimg where q.qna_no = qimg.qna_no(+)) qimg where q.user_no = us.user_no and q.qna_no = qimg.qna_no(+) and q.prod_no = #{prod_no} order by qna_date desc
select user_phone, user_no, roadaddress, addressdetail, user_name from users where user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_QNA_NO.nextval from dual
insert into qna values( #{qna_no}, #{prod_no}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, sysdate, #{qna_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_no}, #{buy_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select SEQ_REVIEW_NO.nextval from dual
insert into review values( #{review_no}, #{prod_no}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, sysdate, #{buy_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_no}, 0 )
mapper.select: select p.prod_no, p.prod_brand, p.prod_name, p.prod_price, p.event_cate, p.prod_img_savename, ca.count, ca.cart_no, p.colorsize_no, p.stock from cart ca, users us , (select prod.prod_no, prod.prod_brand, prod.prod_name, prod.prod_price, prod.event_cate, pimg.prod_img_savename, co.colorsize_no, co.stock from product prod, colorsize co, (select prod_img_savename, prod_no from prodimg where prod_img_type = 'main') pimg where prod.prod_no = pimg.prod_no and prod.prod_no = co.prod_no) p where ca.user_no = us.user_no and ca.prod_no = p.prod_no and us.user_no = #{user_no}
select sum(prod.prod_price * ca.count) from product prod, cart ca, users us where prod.prod_no = ca.prod_no and ca.user_no = us.user_no and us.user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_BUY_NO.nextval from dual
insert into buy values( #{buy_no}, #{user_no}, #{buy_address}, #{buy_ph}, sysdate, #{buy_paytype}, #{buy_price}, '결제완료', #{buy_name} )
insert into buyproduct values( SEQ_BUYPROD_NO.nextval, #{prod_no}, #{colorsize_no}, null, null, '결제완료', #{count}, #{buy_no}, #{buyprod_price} )
mapper.select: select prod.event_cate, sum(bp.count) as count from buyproduct bp, product prod where bp.prod_no = prod.prod_no and bp.buy_no = #{buy_no} group by prod.event_cate order by sum(bp.count) desc

select gimg.gym_img_savename as gymImgSavename, g.gym_no, g.gym_name, g.gym_event, avg(bk.booking_price) as money from gym g, gymimg gimg, booking bk where g.gym_no = bk.gym_no and g.gym_no = gimg.gym_no and gimg.gym_img_type = 'main' and g.gym_event = #{event_cate} group by gimg.gym_img_savename, g.gym_no, g.gym_name, bk.booking_date, g.gym_event order by bk.booking_date desc

select pimg.prod_img_savename, prod.prod_no, prod.prod_brand, prod.prod_name, prod.prod_price, prod.event_cate from product prod, prodimg pimg where prod.prod_no = pimg.prod_no and pimg.prod_img_type = 'main' and prod.event_cate = #{gym_event} order by prod.prod_date desc
